items.content_html: Welcome to the Inspiring-Quote-Generator! This project is a simple web application that generates random inspirational quotes to brighten your day. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it's designed to be lightweight, responsive, and easy to use.

items.content_html: SnapShare is a lightweight social media app built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js). This app allows users to post stories, share posts with friends, and connect with others in a simple, intuitive interface.
